name: SPINNY BALL MAN
description:
This is a very good game. 

Every 10 score a cannon will spawn which rotates and shoots dangerous BALLS! D:

There is a chance for the COOL CANNON to spawn and it's a lot more dangerous than the normal lame cannon man.

If you somehow reach score 100. ALL CANNONS WILL VANISH AND THE LASER SPINNER WILL APPEAR! You will not like the laser spinner.

new update (1.0.1):

 cool cannon bullets are now more recognizable.

 new powerup: shield!

NOW PLAY
